scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore,auth,storage
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test: bash -c 'if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "jest --runInBand"; else echo "Skipping rules tests locally. Run: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "jest --runInBand""; fi'
